entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Invermere
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
